scripts.kompetensi-01: tsc src/kompetensi-01/index.ts --outDir build/kompetensi-01 --lib es6,dom,es5 --downlevelIteration --target es5 && node build/kompetensi-01/index.js
scripts.kompetensi-02: tsc src/kompetensi-02/index.ts --outDir build/kompetensi-02 --lib es6,dom,es5 --downlevelIteration --target es5 && node build/kompetensi-02/index.js
scripts.kompetensi-03: tsc src/kompetensi-03/index.ts --outDir build/kompetensi-03 --lib es6,dom,es5 --downlevelIteration --target es5 && node build/kompetensi-03/index.js
scripts.kompetensi-04: tsc src/kompetensi-04/index.ts --outDir build/kompetensi-04 --lib es6,dom,es5 --downlevelIteration --target es5 --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node && node build/kompetensi-04/index.js
scripts.kompetensi-06: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:serve
